0.0-37-create-short.input: Create a short film about AI learning

scenes.title: Genesis of Intelligence
scenes.description: The scene opens with a close-up of binary code running down a screen, gradually zooming out to reveal a dimly lit room filled with servers, sparking curiosity and intrigue as we witness the birth of AI.
scenes.visualStyle: Cyberpunk aesthetic with high contrast and neon lighting

scenes.title: Learning Process
scenes.description: The process of the AI learning is depicted via a montage of vibrant graphics and dynamic animations showing neural networks forming and adapting.
scenes.visualStyle: Dynamic motion graphics and high-energy animations

scenes.title: Moment of Awareness
scenes.description: The AI achieves a moment of self-awareness, symbolized by the visualization of interconnected data points forming a virtual human face.
scenes.cameraWork: 360-degree camera rotation around the virtual face

scenes.title: Integration
scenes.description: The final scene serves as a metaphor for AI and human synergy, featuring a real person interacting seamlessly with holographic AI projections in a cityscape.
scenes.visualStyle: Mixed reality visual with realistic CG elements
scenes.cameraWork: Steadicam shot with seamless transitions between real and virtual

output.visualEffects: Extensive use of CGI for digital landscapes, neural networks, and virtual human conceptualization. Motion tracking for realistic integration of CGI in live-action scenes.
output.colorGrading: Teal and orange color scheme with selective desaturation to heighten artificiality; high contrast yet with soft highlights for a cinematic texture.
output.audioDesign: Immersive soundscapes employing Dolby Atmos for a 3D auditory experience, focused on the contrast between mechanical and natural sounds.
output.musicComposition: Futuristic and electronic score using synthesizers and orchestral elements to convey the evolving emotions of the AI learning process.
